All the Trainers were now in Prebons office. Prebon stood with his 
back to his troops watching the flashing battle on his scanners. he 
pressed a green button on the console and a 3d view came up on 
screen. 

"It would seem that the Alliance has had the same idea that I thought 
of." He steps a little closer to the screen, "A large concentration 
of Maximals have gathered at the Cybertronian Fire. Since they were 
at a strategic disadvantage I was going to have you attack them, It 
would seem that the Alliance also saw the advantage and took action." 
he looks at Slayer, "This is a chance for all of you to make amends 
for the pathetic attack on the Ark." The comment was directed at 
Slayer but everybody had made mistakes during that attack. "I want my 
orders followed exactly when I order it, not later, there will be no 
excuses for failure. Am I understood?" Prebon stared across his line 
of troops, Bullet, Ignatius, Blaze, Hammer, and Slayer all stood in a 
line before him. "Are there any Questions?" Prebon wasn't really 
interested in questions, he was just wondering who'd be the first to 
question him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer::
> 
> "On my way," Slayer replies, walking off toward Prebon's office.
>

monitored

to

his
